name: SIS X Chakra -Sweat & Spin at Chakra
description: A Women-only rhythm cycling session - 45 minutes of high-energy music, movement & sweat to lift your Sunday mood and spirit.

name: SCC SkyCinema - 13 Going On 30

location.name: Runway 27 Taproom and Kitchen, Marathahalli
location.address: Runway 27 Taproom and Kitchen, Marathahalli Bangalore

description: A screening of 13 Going on 30 brings back all the charm - flirty, funny, and full of heart in this timeless coming-of-age rom-com.

name: OTJF Selectors

location.name: On The Jungle Floor, Indiranagar
location.address: On The Jungle Floor, Indiranagar Bangalore

description: OTJF Selectors kicks off with five nights of pure vinyl flow - DJs and diggers spin what they love, no script, just a store alive with sound and shifting energy

name: Plants matter only when they serve Human needs?
description: Botanist Dr. R. Ganesan asks if plants only matter when they serve us—tracing human-plant ties from nomads to urbanites, with a focus on Bangalore’s shifting greenscape

name: Grassroot Climate Stories

location.name: Indian Institute of World Culture Gallery
location.address: Indian Institute of World Culture Gallery Bangalore

description: On World Environment Day, the Bangalore Film Society hosts screenings and panels spotlighting grassroots climate action - where local resilience meets global urgency

name: Kannada Live Jamming

location.name: Silaa The Garden Cafe, Malleshwaram
location.address: Silaa The Garden Cafe, Malleshwaram Bangalore

description: Artist Pavan Bhat revives retro Kannada classics with quiet power - an evening of soul-stirring melodies & jamming

name: Artisanal Cheese & Craft Chocolate
description: Craft chocolate meets artisanal cheese in a slow, sensory tasting with Patricia Cosma and Nari & Kage’s Founder Benjamin — pairings, stories, and flavour-forward conversations await

name: Souza’s Modernism: Decolonising Art History
description: Author Janeita Singh and art historian Annapurna Garimella unpack F.N. Souza’s radical expressionism—myth, madness, modernism, and the fight to decolonize Indian art history

name: Sound healing
description: A 55-minute sound healing + breathwork session to reset, realign, and release—deep relaxation meets energetic clarity in a guided return to inner balance

name: SIS X Chaos Faktory
description: A women-only parkour and ninja workshop blends vaults, climbs, and movement drills - an empowering session to build strength, agility, and fearless flow

name: Baking 101!
description: Bake eggless cookies, brownies, bread rolls & sponge cake in this hands-on workshop - plus a peek into 3D-printed cookie molds
